data_description.vapid_email: Email to use for html5 push notifications.
data_description.vapid_prv_key: If not specified, one will be automatically generated.

deprecated_yaml_import_issue.title: HTML5 YAML configuration import failed
deprecated_yaml_import_issue.description:
Configuring HTML5 push notification using YAML has been deprecated. An automatic import of your existing configuration was attempted, but it failed.

Please remove the HTML5 push notification YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and reconfigure HTML5 push notification again manually.

data.name: Data
data.description: Extended information of notification. Supports tag.
